title: Assassin's.Creed.IV.Black.Flag.Repack-[SEYTER]
description:
Assassin's.Creed.IV.Black.Flag.Repack-[SEYTER]

Year: 2013 
Genre:   Action, Adventure, 3D, 3rd Person 
Developer: Ubisoft Montreal 
Publisher: Ubisoft Montreal 
Game Version: 1.01 
Publication Type: Rip 
Language:   Russian /  English 
Sound language:   Russian /  English 
Tablet: enclosing (3DM) 



System requirements: 

Operating system: Windows Vista, 7, 8 
Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q8400 / AMD Athlon II X4 620 
RAM: 2 GB (Vista / 7/8) 
Video: GeForce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4870 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 
Free hard drive space: 14 GB 



Description: 
Events Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag developed in 1715. 
Pirates rule the Caribbean, and even established their own 
republic, where corruption, greed and cruelty at every step. 
Amidst all this confusion can be identified brash young captain 
named Edward Kenuey. His quest for fame he has earned the respect, 
comparable even with a black beard, but it also got him into an 
ancient war between Assassins and Templars. A war that could 
destroy everything that was built by pirates. In the role of 
a pirate-assassin Edward will visit more than 50 locations 
- the islands, towns, ports, fishing villages, hidden coves, 
shipwrecks, sugar plantations and even the thick jungle. 
In which of these areas and the order in which Edward gets 
depends only on the player - the developers have provided 
a completely open world.

Repack Features 

It is based on pirates 
Removed multiplayer | Do not recoded 
Game files are not touched 
Game Version - v1.01 
Installation time ~ 9 minutes 
RiP by SEYTER 
game-2.bin - Russian localization 
game-3.bin - English localization
